name: Frankie aka Demon Dog
description: A small yet loud dog that will never be quiet, and will destroy everything in his path.

name: Taco
description: A large dog that has as many brain cells as a rock, and severe seperation anxiety, however he is very loving.

name: Betsy
description: An adorable bundle of joy that is great with kids, and is as playful as any dog you will ever meet.

name: Larry
description: Big and Adorable, a perfect addition to any family.

name: Lunar
description: Has a heart of gold and can't wait to show her new owner all of the love she has to give.

name: Loki
description: Aptly named after the god of mischief, he will keep you on your toes, but is overflowing with love to give to his next owners.
